snippet: The deregulation of energy suppliers in California will be delayed from its scheduled Jan. 1 start because the computer software to monitor who is putting power into the system requires more testing.    The delay was announced on Monday after repr...
lead_paragraph: The deregulation of energy suppliers in California will be delayed from its scheduled Jan. 1 start because the computer software to monitor who is putting power into the system requires more testing. The delay was announced on Monday after representatives of the organization that will oversee the state's power transmission grid and the marketplace that will set daily prices met to discuss whether they were prepared for a smooth transition.
abstract: Deregulation of energy suppliers in California will be delayed from January start because computer monitoring system requires more testing (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Deregulation of Energy Is Delayed in California
